tables.table_schema: CREATE TABLE Cameras ( id INT PRIMARY KEY, camera_id INT, location VARCHAR(255), resolution VARCHAR(50), framerate INT, timestamp TIMESTAMP );
CREATE TABLE LidarSensors ( id INT PRIMARY KEY, sensor_id INT, location VARCHAR(255), accuracy FLOAT, timestamp TIMESTAMP );
CREATE TABLE CameraData ( id INT PRIMARY KEY, camera_id INT, object_type VARCHAR(50), confidence FLOAT, timestamp TIMESTAMP );
CREATE TABLE LidarData ( id INT PRIMARY KEY, sensor_id INT, object_distance FLOAT, object_height FLOAT, timestamp TIMESTAMP );

CREATE TABLE Cameras (
    camera_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    location VARCHAR(255),
    resolution VARCHAR(50),
    streaming_url VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE LidarSensors (
    sensor_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    location VARCHAR(255),
    range DECIMAL(10,2),
    frequency INT
)

CREATE TABLE ObjectDetectionData (
    detection_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    object_type VARCHAR(50),
    confidence DECIMAL(5,2),
    camera_id INT,
    sensor_id INT
)

CREATE TABLE DetectedObjects (
    object_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    detection_id INT,
    object_class VARCHAR(50),
    bounding_box JSONB
)

CREATE TABLE Cars (
    car_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    make VARCHAR(50),
    model VARCHAR(50),
    year INT
)
